name: Green Haven
description: A quiant ocean side village in Roads County

name: Silver Keep
description: A beautiful radiant keep home to the queen of Autumvale on nearby regions Miirym

name: Mordenshire
description: A dark victorian style city in the wetlands of Morden

name: Roads County
description: A green farm and forested area and the furthest point of Queen Miiryms rule. A connection point of nearbouring provences: Alchnee, Pinfir, Darkwood, and Morden

name: Krandor
description: A small village that was destroyed by the wolf lord under a full moon
